object.name: SuggestedPostDeclined
object.description: Describes a service message about the rejection of a suggested post.
object.html_description: Describes a service message about the rejection of a suggested post.
object.rst_description: Describes a service message about the rejection of a suggested post.

annotations.description: Message containing the suggested post. Note that the Message object in this field will not contain the reply_to_message field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Message containing the suggested post. Note that the Message object in this field will not contain the reply_to_message field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Message containing the suggested post. Note that the :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` object in this field will not contain the *reply_to_message* field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.name: suggested_post_message

annotations.description: Comment with which the post was declined
annotations.html_description: Optional. Comment with which the post was declined
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Comment with which the post was declined
annotations.name: comment
